scenario_text.value:
Oh, Professor, Renamon? It’s rare to see the
two of you by yourselves.

Yes, we were just reminiscing about the past.
About my sister and me.
Reminiscing, huh?

I wanted to know about what Miyuki was like
before she came here.

Hearing a version of her I’ve never seen was
pretty interesting.
Yeah, I’d imagine so.

Think I could hear about it, too? I’m curious
about Miyuki. About your past too, Professor.

Ah, ahem, I fear my past is nothing to pique
one’s interest...

But Miyuki, well... She loved to sing back in
the day. I would join her on occasion.

The first time I sang with my sister, her
face stiffened for some reason.
Turning slowly to face me, Miyuki said,

“That’s a pretty unique singing voice you’ve
got there, Akiharu.”
No, you don’t mean...

I found out later that my voice could make
milk curdle. She broke it to me gently.
Pfft, heheh... Akiharu, you... Hahaha!

I was terribly embarrassed, but even so,
I wanted to stay by my sister’s side.
And so I began practicing the piano.

From then on, I would accompany my sister’s
song with a piano performance.
...Well then, was that to your satisfaction?

(What an amazing story. I could feel the
strength of their brother and sister bond.)

(I thought the professor could do anything.
To think he had a weakness like that...)

(And seeing Renamon clutch his belly from
laughter is an even stranger sight.)
(Uh, what do I say here?)
What a great story.
You were awful?
Enjoy that, Renamon?
What a great story.

I think that was a great story! I could tell
how close you two were.
Haha, well it was mostly Miyuki doting on me.

Thinking back on it now, Miyuki was such
a considerate sister, always protecting me...
You were awful?
You must have been really awful, Professor.
Pfft! Heheheh...!

So that is your takeaway from my story...
Well, I suppose I cannot fault you.

Oh no! I just meant that I’ve always thought
you were good at everything.

Oh not at all, my boy. I only learn more of
my shortcomings with age.

If anyone is capable here, it is you and your
friends, Takuma. You all hold such potential.
You think so...?
Enjoy that, Renamon?
Are you...enjoying yourself, Renamon?
Heheh, yes, that was the best.

Miyuki is as amazing as Akiharu is comical.
How could I not? Eheheh...

I’d gotten strangely skillful at the piano in
this form. So that’s the reason... Heheheh.
Harumph... Well, laugh it up, I suppose.

Tell me more, Akiharu. Your stories really
crack me up... Heheh!

Now is that any way to ask a person that?
Well, I suppose if it makes you happy.

(The professor and Renamon are starting up
again. I’d better leave them to it.)

(Both of them are enjoying the professor’s
story time. They both look so happy.)
